title: [Question] Anybody looking for PGs or private hostels near PESU RR?
content: I am from AIML branch and looking for PG near PESU RR, anybody interested in PGs? It would be better if roomates are from same clg, Please DM me.

comments.body: Not interested in hostel or is it filled??
Okay iam joining pes rr after third round. If u find any near by PG please share it.
